MAN.TITLE: lp_interp
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: interpolate (linear) the field into new size and dimension.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: :input field. it must be diffractive wavefront.
: the new size after transformt.( default is 0), if size_new=0, then the size of the field will not changed.
: input the new number after transformt(integer). default is 0, if new_number=0, then the size of the field will not changed.
: the shifts of the X direction in metre. ( default is 0.)
: the shifts of the Y direction in metre. ( default is 0.)
: the rotated angle in degree.( default is 0. )
: the coefficient of magnification ( default is 1.).
: the output field or diffractive wavefront.

DESCRIPTION.P: compare to interpol, interp is more fast (but its effect is not good).
